channel.title: Quest tab
channel.description:
how i can put this [img]http://s22.postimg.org/q4n2bgw4h/Capture.png[/img]
in here?

item.title: Quest tab
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I found this on some third rate forums(Because it isn’t hard to google this):

getPA().sendFrame126("Players Online: "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+ " ", 640); //quest journal title
getPA().sendFrame126("Player Statistics", 663); //quest title
getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Exp Lock Status", 7332);
getPA().sendFrame126(" @yel@"+expLock+" ", 7333); //quest title
getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@PC Points", 7334); //quest title
getPA().sendFrame126(" @yel@"+pcPoints+" ", 7336);
getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Mage Points", 7383); //quest title
getPA().sendFrame126(" @yel@"+magePoints+" ", 7339);
getPA().sendFrame126(" @yel@"+Server.npcHandler.getNpcListName(slayerTask)+" ", 7340); //quest title 
getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Current Slayer Task", 7338); //quest title 
getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Amount Remaining", 7346); //quest title
getPA().sendFrame126(" @yel@"+taskAmount+" ", 7341); //quest title
getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Current Player Kills:@yel@  "+KC+"", 7342);
getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Current Player Deaths:@yel@ "+DC+"", 7337);
getPA().sendFrame126("@yelProject Insanity@", 7343);

Looks like:

Source: http://forum.ragezone.com/f365/tut-cfg-317-pi-adding-702953/

Read full topic

item.title: Quest tab
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“i_pwn_u1, post:3, topic:533255”][quote author=RandQm link=topic=652050.msg4370061#msg4370061 date=1380419161]
Search for lines from the tab like “your xp is” in your server files.
Youll find a bunch of lines like sendQuest("your xp is… or sendFrame126
Replace the text by the text you want
[/quote]

i did but when u click its pop up the old one to show the points why? how do delete that?[/quote]

clicking is obviously handled by your action buttons.
If you don’t see the id of the buttons your press, add this line under “void handleActionButtons” or whatever it’s called
System.out.println(“Button clicked” + c.actionButton)

Then you search in your action buttons for the id and add remove it, or add the code you want

Read full topic
